name: CoayuBot
0:
”Alexa, ask clever bot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask clever bot to start charging.”
”Alexa, ask clever bot for his status.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clever bot
des:
Want an automatic cleaner for floor or carpets? Just speak up! Coayu robot vacuum cleaner is able to be controlled by speaker. To get started, make sure you have “Coayu Robot” and “Alexa” APP ready for operation in your phone. Then, you just need to enable the “ Coayu Robot” skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your “Coayu Robot” account. 
 
When all connection is ready built, you can simply control robot by saying: 
“Alexa, ask clever bot to start cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask clever bot to stop cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask clever bot to start charging.”
“Alexa, ask clever bot to start edge cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask clever bot to start area cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask clever bot to start auto cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask clever bot for his status.” 

Tips: you must firstly bind your robot vacuum cleaner with “Coayu Robot” APP to use the Alexa voice control. 
Please make sure to use your “Coayu Robot” account to link Alexa skill. 
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us: support@cloudsbot.com
